eu.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api

Package
Beschreibung
eu.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api
Defines shared types used to configure and support deployment config generators.
eu.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.spi
Defines the Service Provider Interface (SPI) for Cloudhopper generators.
